page.title: 04Summer Fashion in Pitsea.
page.content: For summer wear in 1985 I would have a beret made of peach coloured wool with a loop on top and a suit that looks like a pair of trousers and a tee-shirt joined together.The colour of this would be peach.They would also be cotton.The sleeves would be half way down my arm.At the end of the sleeves there would be press studs because the sleeves would roll up and so would the trousers.The trousers would be baggy at the top and thin at the bottom.My socks would be white cotton ones.They would be short. My shoes would be peach coloured canvas shoes which would be pointed.They would have rubber soles.They would be slip ons. By Lisa Pink,aged 11.
